title: Ticket #159: Update the DRMAA external
description: Our DRMAA collaborators at OGF requested that we update the Condor DRMAA library for the next release.
check_ins: 2009-Feb-05 17:16   Check-in [13769]: New DRMAA external 1.6 for V7.3.0. The DRMAA implementation is now compliant to GFD.133, the DRMAA 1.0 grid recommendation standard. Three new functions were added to follow the spec. This version also contains fixes for some nasty bugs. (#159) (By bgietzel )
creator: tannenba
